last_episode_to_air.name: The Chameleon (3)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The elusive killer slips free from the police. A manhunt is launched to find the man before he can kill again. In one last encounter, The Chameleon drives across the Texas countryside with a new captive held at gunpoint.

name: Serial Thriller
overview: Based on the true story of a prolific American serial killer, viewers will discover and piece together details of the case alongside the investigators.

episodes.name: Angel of Decay (1)
episodes.overview: A weekend comes to an end when two young women vanish from a tourist area.

episodes.name: Angel of Decay (2)
episodes.overview: A chance arrest leads investigators to an encounter with their prime suspect, but they not sure if they can prove his guilt and continue to hold him.

episodes.name: Angel of Decay (3)
episodes.overview: Investigators are in a race against time to capture the killer; as news of a massacre hits the headlines, it becomes clear that the suspect is on the move in another state; a final showdown ends in a battle of wits.

episodes.name: The Chameleon (1)
episodes.overview: Fear grips the residents of a community when girls begin disappearing at an alarming rate. Detectives are faced with a growing body count and all evidence points to more than one man operating with the same M.O.

episodes.name: The Chameleon (2)
episodes.overview: Pamela is kidnapped and taken from motel to motel across the Southwest by a faceless male assailant and his accomplice Sara. As their drug fueled violence spins out of control, even Sara begins to question her involvement with the charismatic killer.

episodes.name: The Chameleon (3)
episodes.overview: The elusive killer slips free from the police. A manhunt is launched to find the man before he can kill again. In one last encounter, The Chameleon drives across the Texas countryside with a new captive held at gunpoint.
